subject: For car tuner box.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--You Now Gonna Make Them Envy----. So far it's just a board 3 X 4 inches,
AM only. I added a one knob tone control between the tuner and the buffer
amp. This "voice" was with the tone control adjusted to the more bassy side.
